snippet: Our live help line with a veteran college counselor will take place on Wednesday, 8 p.m. Eastern time, on The New York Times’s main Facebook page.
abstract: Our live help line with a veteran college counselor will take place on Wednesday, 8 p.m. Eastern time, on The New York Times’s main Facebook page.
lead_paragraph: We are inviting readers to join our live college application help line on Facebook this week. Marie Bigham, a former college admissions officer and veteran college counselor at Greenhill School, a private high school in Addison, Tex., has agreed to answer your questions in real time, before the ball drops and signals the Jan. 1 deadline for most applications. The live help line will take place on Wednesday, from 8 to 9 p.m. Eastern time, on The New York Times’s main Facebook page. If you would like to get a head start, we encourage you to pose your questions in the comment box of the original post. Ms. Bigham will try to tackle as many early questions as possible during the Facebook chat on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Visit Our Live College Application Help Line on Facebook This Week
